subject: Your Monthly Account Statement is Ready
body: Dear valued client, Your May account statement is now available for viewing on our secure client portal. The statement provides a comprehensive overview of your recent transactions, portfolio performance, and account balances for the previous month. You can also access historical statements and important tax documents from the same platform. We encourage you to log in and review your account activity to ensure everything is in order. If you have any questions about the statement or would like to discuss your portfolio's performance, please do not hesitate to schedule a call with your financial advisor. We are committed to providing you with clear and transparent information about your investments.
